title: release: apt-get install failed
body:
Hello,

For a few days, I cannot install golang with: `sudo apt-get install golang -y` 
`E: Failed to fetch http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/golang/golang-go_1.2.1-2ubuntu1_amd64.deb  Hash Sum mismatch`

Is there a way to fix it ? Or is there an other way to install golang ?


thanks in advance
